vendor_name: InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort and Spa
title: Grand Opening: United Arab Emirates Beachfront Luxury Just an Hour from Dubai with Daily Dining & Club Access
description:
Arabian desert luxury and beachfront bliss come together at the grand opening of the InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort & Spa, ranked #1 of hotels in Ras Al Khaimah by Tripadvisor. This opulent resort features incredible facilities including a private beach, two sparkling swimming pools flanked by cabanas and sun loungers, and a decadent spa offering traditional rituals like a Hammam and grain massage. When it comes to wining and dining, you'll be spoilt for choice with six restaurants and bars onsite: order authentic Turkish mains at Levant & Nar, taste the perfect steak at the New York-inspired NoHo Bar & Grill and sip your favourite premium spirit at the ultra-sleek Amarbar.

Ras Al Khaimah is a natural wonderland for beach lovers and nature enthusiasts thanks to its abundance of pristine beaches and terracotta deserts, set against the looming Hajar Mountains. During a stay at InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort & Spa, enjoy local experiences such as kayaking through mangroves (spotting fuschia flamingos along the way), hiking or mountain biking in Jebel Jais mountain range, or zipping across the hot desert in a 4x4 (charges may apply).
location_description: InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort and Spa
offer_address: Mina Al Arab, Ras Al-Khaimah, United Arab Emirates

title: Five Star Dubai Beachfront Al Marjan Island Haven with Dining, Pools & Spa
description:
Discover the epitome of luxury at this stylish five-star Al Marjan Island resort, positioned on the pristine shores of the Arabian Gulf. Indulge in water sports, relax in the serene spa, or take a refreshing dip in the expansive swimming pools. Savour a culinary journey at one of the hotels six specialty restaurants and bars. Families will love the Kids Club, Teen Zone and mini golf.

Venture beyond the hotel to explore the enchanting Al Marjan Island, a man-made archipelago renowned for its stunning beaches and vibrant nightlife. The hotel is within easy reach of the Al Hamra Mall, offering an array of high-end retail and dining options. Experience the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.
offer_address: Al Marjan Island, Boulevard 322277, Ras Al Khaimah 6636, United Arab Emirates

title: Quintessential Pullman Luxury on Al Marjan Island with Private Beach & Seven Restaurants & Bars
description:
Nestled on Ras Al Khaimah’s first man-made island, this Pullman edifice is a five-star sanctuary where luxury meets Arabian heritage. Overlooking the shimmering Arabian Gulf, this exquisite retreat offers an unparalleled blend of elegance, adventure, and tranquility. Indulge in the serene La`mar Spa, unwind on the private beach, or take a dip in the indoor and outdoor pools.

For thrill-seekers, exhilarating water sports, dune bashing, and camel rides await, while history lovers can explore Ras Al Khaimah’s rich cultural heritage. Just an hour from Dubai, this exclusive resort-the only one with two waterfronts-invites you to experience the UAE beyond its skyscrapers, embracing its traditions, landscapes, and warm hospitality.
offer_address: Marjan Island Blvd. Marjan Island, Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates, 14745

title: United Arab Emirates Five-Star Al Marjan Island Escape with 12 Restaurants & Bars
description:
Uncover a blend of Arabian hospitality and modern elegance at this five-star sanctuary, perfectly situated on the pristine beaches of Ras Al Khaimah. Soak up the panoramic city and ocean views, lounge by the sparkling pool and rejuvenate with treatments at the spa. With endless activities and a vast array of restaurants and bars to choose from, this is the perfect escape for a fun-filled and relaxing holiday. 

When hunger strikes, tuck into a myriad of dining options, from the Turkish delights of Lalezar to the seafood specialties at Fishbone Restaurant. This captivating destination offers a perfect blend of stunning natural landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and thrilling adventures. An hour from Dubai and it's vibrant landmarks, this elegant resort is perfect for an unforgettable adventure.
offer_address: Al Marjan Island, Ras Al Khaimah 14744, United Arab Emirates

title: United Arab Emirates Beachfront Luxury with Seven Onsite Restaurants & Bars & Four Pools
description:
Desert luxury and beachfront bliss come together at Sofitel Al Hamra Beach Resort set on a stretch of pristine sand just an hour from Dubai. This opulent retreat boasts a private white-sand beach, a tranquil spa and a selection of fine dining options - including four restaurants and three bars.

Venture out to explore the nearby Al Hamra Mall, brimming with high-end boutiques and international brands, or take a short drive to the Dhayah Fort, offering panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and azure waters. After a day of exploration, retreat to one of the hotel's sun-soaked pools or relax at the tranquil Sofitel SPA with Clarins.
offer_address: Vienna Street, Al Hamra Village, Ras Al Khaimah 14560, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: Anantara Mina Al Arab Ras Al Khaimah Resort
title: Beachfront Mina Al Arab Luxury on Private Peninsula with Six Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Experience the allure of the Arabian Gulf at this luxury retreat located on a private peninsula in the United Arab Emirates' northernmost emirate. This lavish resort offers a unique blend of traditional Arabian charm and contemporary elegance. Choose from six exquisite restaurants and bars to satiate your appetite, or rejuvenate your senses at the tranquil spa. There's plenty of chances to stay active with watersports on offer to make the most of the beachside location.
location_description: Anantara Mina Al Arab Ras Al Khaimah Resort
offer_address: Al Huwailat Street, Mina Al Arab, Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates

vendor_name: InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort and Spa
title: United Arab Emirates Beachfront Luxury with Six Onsite Restaurants & Bars
description: Desert luxury and beachfront bliss come together at InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort and Spa, an IHG Hotel, set on a stretch of pristine sand just an hour from Dubai. This opulent resort features incredible facilities including a private beach, two sparkling swimming pools flanked by cabanas and sun loungers, and a decadent spa offering a hammam experience and traditional rituals like grain massage. When it comes to wining and dining, you'll be spoilt for choice with six restaurants and bars onsite.
location_description: InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort and Spa, an IHG Hotel
